short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click on the plugin icon to download your ChatGPT chats to JSON format.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: To make it simpler to reload the chat model through code or API, you can download your ChatGPT chats in JSON format by clicking on the plugin icon.
